cofh.api.item

Interface IAugmentItem


  • public interface IAugmentItem

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAugmentLevel(ItemStack stack, java.lang.String type)
      Get the augmentation level for a given Augment and Augment Type.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAugmentTypes(ItemStack stack)

    • Method Detail

      • getAugmentLevel

        int getAugmentLevel(ItemStack stack,
                  java.lang.String type)
        Get the augmentation level for a given Augment and Augment Type.
        Parameters:
        stack - ItemStack representing the Augment.
        type - String containing the Augment type name.
        Returns:
        The Augment level of the stack for the requested type - 0 if it does not affect that attribute.

      • getAugmentTypes

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAugmentTypes(ItemStack stack)
        Get the Augment Types for a given Augment. Set ensure that there are no duplicates.
        Parameters:
        stack - ItemStack representing the Augment.
        Returns:
        Set of the Augmentation Types. Should return an empty set if there are none (but this would be really stupid to make). DO NOT RETURN NULL.
